text: With their announcement that they are going to marry, Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are making history in several ways. For one thing, Markle, 36, isn ’ t the daughter of a grand aristocratic family, nor is she even British. Rather, she ’ s an American TV actress and a divorcee. In this way, the Los Angeles - reared Markle will be the first American whose marriage to a member of the royal family will be embraced by the “ firm, ” as the family calls itself. Her situation in 2017 isn ’ t at all scandalous, unlike that of King Edward VIII, who was forced to abdicate the throne in 1936 in order to marry the twice - divorced American socialite Wallis Simpson.
